Summary: serotonin activates 5-HT3 receptor (HTR3A, HTR3B, HTR3C, HTR3D, HTR3E).
serotonin activates 5-HT3 receptor (HTR3A, HTR3B, HTR3C, HTR3D, HTR3E). This interaction is inhibited by tropisetron.
Biochemical reaction from tropisetron to 6-hydroxytropisetron. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2D6 or CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from tropisetron to 5-hydroxytropisetron. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from tropisetron to 7-hydroxytropisetron. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP2D6.
Transport from tropisetron to tropisetron. This interaction is catalyzed by SLC22A1.
